scoringPlays.text: Mark Andrews 17 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Rushel Shell 5 Yd Run (Josh Lambert Kick)
Sterling Shepard 28 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Joe Mixon 35 Yd Run (Austin Seibert Kick)

Skyler Howard 50 Yd Run (Josh Lambert Kick)
Durron Neal 71 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Jordan Evans 41 Yd Fumble Return (Austin Seibert Kick)

videos.description: Oklahoma quarterback Baker Mayfield completes a 17-yard touchdown pass to tight end Mark Andrews, putting the Sooners up 7-0 over West Virginia.
videos.headline: Oklahoma first to score on QB-to-TE connection

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Oklahoma first to score on QB-to-TE connection) 2015/10/03 ESHEET

videos.description: West Virginia QB Skyler Howard sprints down field for a 50-yard touchdown run in the third quarter against Oklahoma.
videos.headline: Mountaineers QB rushes 50 yards for TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Mountaineers QB rushes 50 yards for TD) 2015/10/03 ESHEET

videos.description: Baker Mayfield connects with Durron Neal for 71-yard touchdown to give Oklahoma a 34-24 lead.
videos.headline: Oklahoma's Mayfield throws to wide-open Neal for 71-yard TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Oklahoma's Mayfield throws to wide-open Neal for 71-yard TD) 2015/10/03 ESHEET
